name: Divide and Conquer (bodCodes)
description:
This game was created from scratch around the theme of "Earthquake" for the 2022 LÖVE Game Jam.

Coding, graphics, sound and music by bodCodes.

Controls/Options
  • A/D to move left/right
  • W to jump
  • Left mouse to grapple
  • Toggles: (M)usic  S(o)und  Effec(t)s  (F11) Fullscreen

Developed for and tested with LÖVE 11.3 and 11.4.
